channel.title: Runserver
channel.description:
Everytime I click Runserver.bat i keep getting this Error:
"Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . ."
I have the latest Java, and my Environmental Variables set. Any ideas?

item.title: Runserver
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

no problem. But remember to compile before running just in case.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Ah well, It’s fixed, thanks for the help guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

On another topic

Lol’d, why do you think I’m asking for help? Not like I studied all this crap for years.

Java is wonderful. You should… Then you can lol @ the noobs who try n prove the more expierienced people wrong. ;)…

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“dragonchain, post:6, topic:162554”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=221102.msg1913506#msg1913506 date=1196801568]

You have to download winRAR then you right click your source file and click extract here then another file will create, then go into that file and compile and then runserver.bat

Your sig says it all…

Proud Dumb 10 year old programmer

…

Its nothing to do with winRAR…

COUGH!..

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server

Cough, NoClassFound: server…
Cough…

You have no server.class.
[/quote]
Noob… he just repped me 1 and it said thanks for fixing thats why it says edit fixed… even asked him I fixed it and yes it does have to do with that… you have to extract all the class folders … so your dumb so screw off.[/quote]

/Fail to you. Rep matters? Nope. He said thanks for fixing? Quote it please. You didn’t fix it… When you extract a folder, full of classes and java files, they all go to the same files, winRar doesn’t say to the folder “Hey THERE IS SERVER.CLASS LETS JUMP HIM!!” Server.class is taken away… Yeah man, sure im dumb, you should ask anyone what that error means. If you think it’s to do with winrar, well all i can tell you, is to fuck off. Everyone should know that error. ITS WORDED “NOCLASSDEFFOUND: SERVER” Your retarded, so don’t tell me im dumb. And wtf, how can you have .class folders? And they should be all in 1 folder. SO YOU FUCK OFF. You fail.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2007, 10:00:20 AM[/size][hr][quote="`Rich, post:1, topic:162560"]Actually, what dragonchain said, worked for me. I just got to learn how to get my No-Ip to work so I can log-in my Server.[/quote]

HAHA you fail aswell. If you click extract at the top, it extracts all the files, not just a couple. Dumbass. And you don’t need No-ip to go on your server.

Read full topic
